articles.title: Will Israel-Hamas war affect India's economy? - DW (English)
articles.description: India's economy has been a recent success story, but the growing conflict in the Middle East has raised geopolitical concerns about stable prices and oil supply.
articles.content:
The ongoing Israel-Hamas war is causing concern in India over the conflict's potential impact on oil prices.
India is the world's third-largest oil-consumer and importer, and although India has been… [+4403 chars]
